channel.title: Introduction To Firefox (Download Inclued)
channel.description:
Hello All!,
Today/Tonight I will be teaching you to install and how to use Mozilla Firefox. There will be 2 Easy-To-Read parts to this guide it may look long but that because it VERY detailed. Hopefully by the end of this you will be on your way on being a Firefox Expert!
[b]Why To Make The Switch[/b]
Please take some time to read Rons post on [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2279.0.html]"Mozilla Firefox Vs. I.E"[/url]
[b]Part 1: Installation and configuration[/b]
Obviously, the first thing you need to do is get your free copy of the Mozilla Firefox browser. You can locate the Firefox installer on the Mozilla download page. If you go to this page, [url=http://mozilla.org/products/firefox/]http://mozilla.org/products/firefox/[/url], you will always find the newest version available. Now, I recommend you read on the page which version you should download, as Mozilla Firefox develops at a high pace, it's not always the good thing to get the latest version, as it is with most programs. :) I will use the Windows version and the series will mainly evolve around Windows issues. Download the file and you are ready to begin.
[b]Installing Firefox[/b]
Firefox has the basic installation procedure as most programs do.
[b]The Installation[/b]
Now click on the Firefox installation icon[b]>[/b]Click "Next"[b]>[/b]Read Terms And Conditions If You Are Convince There Aren't Cheap Asses' then click "Next" [b]>[/b] Now You Can Either Choose "Standard" Or "Custom" You Can Choose Either But I Strongly Recommend You Choose Standard Then Click Next[b]>[/b]This Tells You Where It Will Install Its Self Just For Future Reference, When Read It Click Next[b]>[/b] Click Finished And You Have Successfully Install Mozilla Firefox!
[b]Part 2: Basic Functions And Buttons[/b]
Mozilla Firefox consists of many functions and buttons which make your time with the Internet a hell of alot easier!
[b]The Mouse[/b]
You can use the mouse to open a new tab just by pressing the "Scroll" button (usually located in the middle of the mouse) this will open a new tab of what ever link you clicked on.
[b]The Commands[/b]
# [b]Ctrl+N[/b] - Opens a new browser window. # [b]Ctrl+T[/b] - Opens a new "Tab" window in the browser, try it. ;) # [b]Ctr+O[/b] - Open a file. # [b]Ctrl+W[/b] - Close a "Tab" window in the browser. # [b]Ctrl+Shift+W[/b] - Close window. # [b]Ctrl+R[/b] - Refresh window.
[b]Blocking Pop-Ups[/b]
Pop-ups can at times be very annoying if you haven't taken precautions. If you go Tools > Options and you will see a window with 7 tabs on the side. Now click on "Web Features" and make sure that "Pop-Up Windows" is checked so those super annoying DON'T PLAY NORMAL POKER WHEN YOU CAN PLAY SUPER POKER!!! amd don't get me started on the BUY 1 RING TONE GET ONE FREE! so this features totally gets rid of it THANK GOD FOR FIREFOX!
[b]Conclusion[/b]
I hope this helps all you guys/girls our there switching from Internet Explorer to Mozilla Firefox. I sorry if this has been posted before but i don't think it has. This guide is a 100% made by Dark Star For Moparisthebest.com please PM me if any other site has it [b]I HATE RIPPERS![/b]
Cheers,
Dark Star
